definitions: the state or quality of being arranged neatly and in order

examples.text: the tidiness of my workspace is frequently noted by others
people commented on the general tidiness of the town
the CEO preferred clear reporting lines and administrative tidiness

shortDefinitions: state or quality of being arranged neatly and in order

definitions: inclination to keep things or one's appearance neat and in order

examples.text: Leonard is obsessed with tidiness and routine
he was noted for his immaculate tidiness

shortDefinitions: inclination to keep things or one's appearance neat and in order
